Ingredients.4: 2 cups shredded leftover cooked pot roast

Ingredients.5: 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened and cubed

Ingredients.7: 0.5 cup sour cream, or more to taste

Ingredients.8: 2 cloves garlic, minced, or more to taste

Directions.1: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).

Directions.2: Heat tallow in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add mushrooms and saute until softened, about 5 minutes. Remove to a plate. Add onion to the skillet and cook until charred, 7 to 10 minutes. Remove from the heat.

Directions.3: Place leftover pot roast in the bottom of a baking dish. Top with mushrooms and onions.

Directions.4: Combine cream cheese, broth, sour cream, garlic, and onion powder in the jar of an immersion blender; puree until smooth. Pour over meat, mushrooms, and onions. Place Gouda cheese slices on top.

Directions.5: Bake in the preheated oven until bubbling and cheese is melted and golden, about 30 minutes.
